remarks:
TOURISM DIRHAM FEE (mandatory and paid directly at and to the hotel):
AED 10 per night

Bedding: 1 Child FOC sleeping on existing bedding
Breakfast Rates (only applicable to Breakfast rates / not relevant for Room-Only rates): 
Age 0 to 5 - Free of Charge
Age 6 to 16 - AED 29.5 net per child

Bedding: 1 Child FOC sleeping on existing bedding
Breakfast Rates (only applicable to Breakfast rates / not relevant for Room-Only rates): 
Age 0 to 5 - Free of Charge
Age 6 to 16 - AED 29.5 net per child
1 King + Sofa bed - OR - 2 Single + Sofa bed

General:
* Sofa bed is suitable for a child
** Extra Adult is not allowed in our room occupancy
*** subject to the prior stipulation (**) above, max Pax Occupancy is for occupancy mix between Adults & Children
